to.sven.androidrccar.client.test.logic.handler

Class LocationMessageHandlerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • AndroidTestCase
      • to.sven.androidrccar.client.test.logic.handler.AbstractTestCaseForClientMessageHandler<LocationMessageHandler>
        • to.sven.androidrccar.client.test.logic.handler.LocationMessageHandlerTest

  • public class LocationMessageHandlerTest
extends AbstractTestCaseForClientMessageHandler<LocationMessageHandler>
    This class should test the behavior of the LocationMessageHandler. It also tests the behavior of the LocationMessage.
    Author:
    sven

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void initFeatures()
      Creates a new FeatureMessage and adds it to the AbstractTestCaseForClientMessageHandler.cdcMock.

      Mocks the location of this device (Client).

      Creates the LocationMessageHandler and calls LocationMessageHandler.handleMessage(to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.LocationMessage).
      private void setLatLong(Location remoteLocation)
      Sets the mock location of the remote device (Host).
      protected void setUp()
      In addition to AbstractTestCaseForClientMessageHandler.setUp() is set up also a mock for ILocationService.
      void testHandleMessage_All()
      Tests LocationMessageHandler.handleMessage(to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.LocationMessage): Everything is transmitted.
      void testHandleMessage_BearingOnly()
      Tests LocationMessageHandler.handleMessage(to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.LocationMessage): Only bearing is transmitted.
      void testHandleMessage_Location()
      Tests LocationMessageHandler.handleMessage(to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.LocationMessage): Only location is transmitted.
      void testHandleMessage_SpeedOnly()
      Tests LocationMessageHandler.handleMessage(to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model.LocationMessage): Only speed is transmitted.
      void testToAndroidLocation()
      Test if LocationMessage.altitude and LocationMessage.accuracy is correctly converted.
      protected void verifyFieldMocks()
      In addition to AbstractTestCaseForClientMessageHandler.verifyFieldMocks() is set up also verifies locationServiceMock.

      • testToAndroidLocation

        public void testToAndroidLocation()
        Test if LocationMessage.altitude and LocationMessage.accuracy is correctly converted. (These are the only fields that not implicit tested by the other methods.)
